title: Lift the Shadow Curse
content:
E Spells such as Wall of Fire, Sleet Storm, Guardian of Faith and Fireball are very handy. (You can also place explosives to make the fight easier.)

From this point on, you can have Halsin follow you like any other character. This is however not required to complete the quest.

He will hide first near the cart outside of the small hut, and then inside the house again. Merely walking close to him reveals him.
